description:
Hello

LÃ¼scher believed that because the color selections are guided in an unconscious manner, they reveal the person as they really are, not as they perceive themselves or would like to be perceived.

In this course, we will see how to communicate with the others through their color's personality.

We will study the type of colors in order to understand the behaviors and motivations of others relative to their personalities in order to recognize personality differences and characteristics

In this course, we will learn about the different types of personality through four main colors:

The course is divided by three parts:

Part 1: Type of colors

Part 2: What color are you?

Part3: Frustrating things to...

  1. Yellow;
  2. Green;
  3. Red
  4. Blue

KeyWords:

Colors; Personality; Coaching your self; Know yourself better

WELCOME TO ALL OF YOU
title: Personality Through Colors
